price: 23. Toh Yalli abaareeh, aytiitaa kee intiita waysiise mara cakkik.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
